rooms.name: entrance_hall
rooms.description: Vastu-compliant entrance positioned in the north-eastern corner, ensuring energy flow and auspiciousness.

rooms.name: living_room
rooms.description: spacious living room adjacent to entrance hall, located in the south-west direction for social interactions as per Vastu guidelines.

rooms.name: dining_area
rooms.description: dining area designed near the kitchen, aligning with Vastu norms by maintaining balance and functional flow.

rooms.name: kitchen
rooms.description: functional kitchen positioned in the north-west quadrant to avoid accumulation of heat, following Vastu principles.

rooms.name: duplex_studio_apartment
rooms.description: A duplex studio apartment is designed with two levels within one unit. The lower portion serves as a living and sleeping area, while the upper portion offers a private workspace or additional relaxation space, ensuring natural light from the east.

rooms.name: private_gym
rooms.description: Private gym located adjacent to the duplex studio apartment for convenience and wellness, with windows facing north for proper ventilation as per Vastu norms.

openings.name: front_door
openings.description: Main entrance door aligned in the north-east direction, adhering to Vastu compliance.

openings.name: balcony_access
openings.description: Balcony access leading to the rooftop terrace, positioned for optimal sunlight and air circulation.

swimming_pool.description: Vastu-compliant swimming pool designed to promote relaxation and balance, with water element placement considered.

rooftop_terrace.description: Rooftop terrace offering panoramic views, incorporating Vastu principles by providing space for meditation and sunlight exposure.
